coreAttributes.name: frontal-zip dress
coreAttributes.description: A tight fitting bodycon dress with a zip that runs the entire way up the front.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] on the dress and zip [npc.herself] up.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc2.name] into the frontal-zip dress and [npc.verb(zip)] [npc2.herHim] up.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] into the frontal-zip dress and [npc.verb(zip)] [npc2.herHim] up.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] fully [npc.verb(unzip)] [npc.her] frontal-zip dress and [npc.verb(shrug)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] fully [npc.verb(unzip)] [npc2.namePos] frontal-zip dress and [npc.verb(pull)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] hastily [npc.verb(unzip)] [npc2.namePos] frontal-zip dress and roughly [npc.verb(pull)] it off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the bottom of [npc.her] frontal-zip dress back down into the proper position.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the bottom of [npc2.namePos] frontal-zip dress back down into the proper position.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the bottom of [npc2.namePos] frontal-zip dress back down into the proper position.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the bottom of [npc.her] frontal-zip dress.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the bottom of [npc2.namePos] frontal-zip dress.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of the bottom of [npc2.namePos] frontal-zip dress, before roughly pulling it up.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(zip)] up the front of [npc2.namePos] dress.
